title: What annoys hotel guests the most?
text:
Need a flight? We'll scan dozens of airlines and get you the best fare in seconds! What annoys hotel guests the most? Article By: Megan Ellis Thu, 20 Aug 2015 8:48 AM Share Your Email Credit: flickr.com/Daniel Lobo photography 
Hotels often get things right - but they can also get things wrong. So what are travellers' biggest pet peeves when it comes to hotels? 
Frequent Business Traveler magazine has released the results of its 2015 Hotel Pet Peeves Survey . 
Coming out on top, as the biggest pet peeve, is expensive and/or slow Internet. 
Slow or expensive Internet is truly hated, as it has taken the number one spot for four years. It's especially annoying when you have work to do or would like to share your adventures online. 
Coming in second place is hard-to-reach and/or insufficient electrical outlets. I know I often find myself searching every corner of the room for more outlets. 
In third place is poor room cleanliness - which would personally be my first pet peeve. 
Here are the full top ten hotel pet peeves: 
1. Expensive and/or slow Internet 2. Hard-to-reach and/or insufficient electrical outlets 3. Poor room cleanliness 5. Climate control not easily adjustable 6. Noise of any kind 7. Insufficient water pressure or temperature 8. Unexpected fees (including resort fees) 9. Uncomfortable pillows 10. Insufficient or poor lighting 
What is your top hotel pet peeve? Let us know in the comments below... Related Articles
